name: DarkSearch for Google (updated)
description:
WARNING: THIS STYLE IS DEPRECATED AND BEING REPLACED WITH A NEW ONE. IT WILL NOT BE UPDATED ANY LONGER.

The most comprehensive dark theme for Google, with the latest patches and customizable contrast (click on 'Customize Settings' and reinstall afterwards).
Before reporting a bug, please make sure you're up to date - many get fixed rather quickly.
View the source - contributions are welcomed!
Original work by Nass O!
GPLv3 licensed, see the repository.

If you like dark grey styles, feel free to take a look at my recently released Twitter Desaturated!
obsoletion_message: THIS STYLE IS DEPRECATED AND BEING REPLACED WITH A NEW ONE. FIND THE LINK IN THE DESCRIPTION.
additional_info: 3.3.0: add deprecation warning 3.2.0: fixed text/background coloring of ads and result info (by Seanharrs, thanks!) 3.1.20: fixed movie reviews 3.1.19: repaired account dropdown after site update (again) 3.1.18: fixed sign-in button 3.1.17: repair after site update 3.1.16: fixed multiple account dropdown 3.1.15: styled tweet carousel 3.1.14: styled "People also search for" 3.1.13: styled "Find my phone" 3.1.12: improved image related search terms (better than Google) 3.1.11: styled "What's my IP?" 3.1.10: styled popular times 3.1.9: styled books widgets 3.1.8: styled currency conversion 3.1.7: styled time differences 3.1.6: fixed container shadow, app menu icon; styled twitter embeds 3.1.5: styled 'Things to do in' 3.1.4: now works completely even in the rare occurence of being loaded late; styled stock graphs 3.1.3: styled graph labels 3.1.2: styled startpage upper left, app menu, 'more' arrow; fixed video thumbnails 3.1.1: styled news sources 3.1.0: more customizable colors (link, source); styled word definition images, expandables, location footer 3.0.0: initial fork; made text and background colors customizable; styled app menu icon

discussions.name: "Critic reviews" section in movie results need some work [unreadable fonts]
Great update to a great style
The Color of the Prices on Google Shopping Are the Same as the Background
